in mohothakata pasu hethema awasan husma heluyen ohu liyu liyawilla kisi dineka kisiwaku athata pathwannata idak nomathi bawath eya anawaranaya kara ganumata daru awasan prayathnayath wyartha wu waga wadakagaraya bharakaru waha ihalata danwa sitiyeya.mema liyawilla in wasara hathalis pahakata pasu wishwa widyalaye parani lipi lekhana sanrakshanagaraye biththiyaka wu lali warichchiyak aluthwadiyawata galawamin sitiya di rahasigatha lesa sangawa thibu kadadasi bambuwak thula surundu wi thibuyen waduwan athata path wiya.ema waduwan wisin parissam kara gena ma kara paminena thek me liyawilla kisiwekuth wisin nokiyawa thibu bawa mama hondinma danimi.***wishwa widyalaye upadhi patamala warthamana aarthika wyuhayata nogalapenne yayi wasara desiya dahathunakata pasuwa soya ganimen pasuwa wahama kriyathmaka wana paridi siyalu patamala sanshodhanaya kota kriyathmaka kala yuthu wagata- pawathuna adhyapana kramayata anuwa samanya pela wishayan aten wishayan thunak samath wi siti adhyapana amathyawaraya waha chakralekhayak nikuth karanna wuyen dijital kramopayan anusarayen prawruththi nirmanaya pilibanda upadhi patamalawa - poth nokiyawa poth gana katha kirime upadhi patamalawa - thuwakku saha wedi unda prathichakrikaranaya pilibanda upadhi patamalawa da siyadiwi nasa ganima pilibanda upadhi patamalawa da athuluwa pansiya panas pahak wana nawa upadhi wahama kriyathmaka wana paridi sanshodhana patamala lesa handunwa dime kshanika awashyathawa pana nagi athi bawa me pilibanda paryeshanaye yedunu thripudgala kamituwa siya awasan nirikshana warthawata athulath kara thibuyen ema patamala atharin samaharak iganwima pinisa danata adhyayana kshethraye paryeshana katayuthu lesa yam yam dewal karamin siti kisidu mahacharyawarayeku asamath bawa da soya ganimen anathuruwa mema patamalawan iganwimata samath ayagen illum path kandawimata wishwawidyala amathyanshaya thiranaya karana ladi.sanniwedanaya pilibanda ratawal dahathunaka deshana pawathwana, ee nisama chiraprasiddhiyata path danata wideshagathawa siti ekthara mahacharyawarayeku nawatha diwayinata genwa ganima udesa dolar miliyana pahalowaka asthamenthuwak anumatha karawa ganimata adhyapana amathi kara pamini wishwawidyala amathyanshaye lekam mahathage wada thahanam kota barapathala wada sahithawa bandhanagara gatha wannata siduwuye ema patamalawa iganwima udesa rata thulama jiwath wu jana sanniwedanaya pilibanda kela pamini niwedikawak siya illum pathraya amathiwaraya wetha ekthara hima watena rataka di pawathwu sammelanayak aawaranaya karannata gos sitiya di amathiwarayage ande kottaya yata thaba ennata ayata haki wimenya.
